name: Web-product analyst - data scientist
description:
We seek an experienced Web/Marketing Analyst, an organised and self-motivated individual responsible for data analysis and insights-based reporting to help plan, measure, and optimise marketing activities and targeting. The analyst will work collaboratively with the marketing team to identify data-driven insights, measure the impact of marketing efforts, and make proactive recommendations to improve performance and meet business objectives and challenges.

The ideal candidate will have had previous hands-on experience as a Web/Marketing Analyst and will be able to give examples of how his/her insight helped shape a particular digital strategy/project.

Responsibilities:

  • Monitor and report on website performance using analytical tools, including Google Analytics
  • Analyse and document the impact of online marketing tactics, site changes, events and other critical drivers of website performance.
  • Build, produce reports and present recommendations to the marketing team
  • Make recommendations for customer experience optimisation by utilising the full range of data sources.
  • Identify opportunities to improve Business/Marketing Analytics
  • Develop a complex website tracking system using analytics tools that may include Google Analytics, MixPanel, Google Tag Manager, JavaScript, etc.
  • Identify A/B tests and generate funnel optimisation suggestions in close co-operation with other marketing department colleagues
  • Discover and manage existing and new customer profiles and segments used to optimise performance
  • Run in-depth reports and present them to the broader teams & stakeholders

Requirements:

  • College or university degree
  • Proficiency in spoken and written English
  • High level of interest in Marketing
  • Outstanding analytical skills with a strong knowledge of multiple analytical tools and programs
  • Advanced expertise in the generation, collection and analysis of visitor behaviour data
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain technical matters to a non-technical audience
  • Strong understanding of Google Analytics & Google Tag Manager
  • Knowledge of data query languages such as SQL (working knowledge MySQL will be considered a plus)
  • Understanding of CRO (conversion rate optimisation)
  • Knowledge of user experience (UX)
  • Strong independent contributor – that excels in a team – and progresses the team
  • Ambitious critical thinker with a problem-solving attitude
  • Proven ability to work effectively in a team environment as well as independently with minimal supervision
  • Experience in the Forex industry is an advantage

What we offer:

  • Competitive salary and benefit package
  • An international team where self-management and collaboration are key elements
  • Pleasant working environment
  • Chance to work in a fast-moving, innovative and international environment, dealing with all kinds of different countries and cultures
  • Performance bonuses paid twice a year

We are ready to discuss a remuneration package with successful candidates
